Autonomous Maze Solving Robot

International Autonomous Robotics Competition (iARC), TechKritiâ€™14, IIT Kanpur (March 2014)

I worked in a team of 4 members to build and program an autonomous line following robot which is capable of solving arbitrary loop-less mazes and returning to the start point in the shortest possible path. The bot was placed 4th in the international round of the iARC competition held during TechKriti 2014 at IIT Kanpur.
